PasswordPolicy.name: Name
PasswordPolicy.maxPasswordAge: Maximum number of days for password validity.
PasswordPolicy.minPasswordAge: Minimum number of days for password validity.
PasswordPolicy.minRulesToFulfill: Minimum number of additional rules for policy
PasswordPolicy.maxHistorySimilar: Nuber of checked old passwords  zptn kontrolovanch hesel na shodu
PasswordPolicy.identityAttributeCheck: User attributes not allowed in password

help.defaultPolicy: Default policy is used for password validation for IdM system and all systems without set password policy.
help.maxPasswordAge: Maximum number of days for password validity.
help.minPasswordAge: Minimum number of days for password validity.
help.enchancedControl: Enhanced control makes passwords more secure by comparing new passwords with previous ones and user attributes. It is possible to select which rules are required.
help.rules: Select which rules are required set number of how many additional rules newly created password must fulfill at least.
help.minRulesToFulfill: Minimum number of the requirements which password must match to be valid.
help.maxHistorySimilar: Number of retroactively checked passwords, which cannot be same as new.
help.prohibitedCharacters: Listed characters are not allowed for generating and validating passwords. Enter characters without spaces, e.g. 1LliIo0!
help.bases: Character set allowed for password generation. Forbidden characters are excluded from sets.
help.identityAttributeCheck: Password may not contain any listed attributes or variations thereof.
help.emptyValues: To omit any field, leave it empty or set value to 0.
help.passphraseWords: Select number of words passphrase contains.
